work.name: Intelligent Warehouse Department, Yunda Express
work.summary: Developing perception algorithms for robotics arms and autonomous ground vehicles
highlights: Designed and deployed a 6D object detection module for a robotics arm through using ISAAC.
Designed and deployed 2D & 3D perception module of a Autonomous Ground Vehicle.
Designed and deployed a POSP(Picking Out Signle Package) system for Yunda Express.

work.name: Autonomous Driving Department, Pixmoving
work.summary: Developing perception algorithms for autonomous vehicles and robotics arms
highlights: Developed a standard Pixkit-1.0 full-stack autonomous driving platform from 0 to 1.
Completed a Follow Me Project which satisfed our customers.
Launched a trash perception module of sweeping robots for our customers.
Designed and deployed the whole perception framework of a robobus(shuttle bus) project.

courses: Object Oriented Programming and Software Design
Modelling and Simulation of Natural Systems
